name: PlayTest (Deeto_96)
description:
WASD/Left Stick on controller - move

SPACEBAR / A or X on controller - jump/double jump

"DOWN INPUT" while airborne to fast fall

LEFT CLICK / RT on controller - shoot

The goal is to find the exit of the level.

You get three lives to complete three levels

You also have limited ammo that you can pick up after shooting.
